items.sentence: Are you sure you want to walk home in the dark?
Are you sure you want to put that on the stove?
Are you sure you want to live with your father?
Are you sure you want to work for that company?
I wasn't able to hold onto the rope any longer.
Tom entered the room, holding a sheet of paper.
Tom goes to see Mary in the hospital every day.
Drink as much as you want. I'm driving tonight.
Even police officers sometimes drink and drive.
Tom seemed scared to admit that he didn't know.
